name: Individual Staff Licenses
description: Your shop will need to have licensed staff.  It is the responsibility of shop owner to ensure each staff member is appropriately licensed. Licenses are required for cosmetologists, hairstylists, manicurists, skin care specialists, barbers, hair braiders, beauticians, and teacher licenses. If staff do not already have a license, they can obtain a license by taking an exam with  the Department of Consumer Affairs.

destination.name: New Jersey Department of Consumer Affairs

to_complete_must_have: Name and address of the school that provided license training
